416b8(mdo sde): gnas sgra la chags pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas
417a1(mdo sde): brtags na/ tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing / sems shin tu bsgoms pa gang gis/ sangs rgyas gzi byin dpag tu med pa dang ldan
417a2(mdo sde): pa la gdugs phul na/ de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten sgra la chags pa zhes bya ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang lci'i bde
417a3(mdo sde): ba dang ldan pa de/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya'i ri rnam pa sna tshogs la/ rgyu ba dag la bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ste/ lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor
417a4(mdo sde): bu 'khor dang bcas pa dag rin po che sna bdun gyi ri'i rtse mo rnams su rgyu zhing / rol me'i tshal zhes bya ba 'tshal der 'jug par byed do// lci'i 'phreng ba dang / gos gyon pa/
417a5(mdo sde): me tog gi phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i dris rnam par brgyan pa de/ res 'ga' spos kyi tshal zhes bya ba'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes
417a6(mdo sde): par byas pa'i tshal du yang 'jug par byed do// tshal de na chu bo dang 'bab chu dang / lteng ka dang / pad mi'i rdzing dang / shing ljon pas mdzes par byas pa yin te/
417a7(mdo sde): rnam pa ci tsam du bya 'dab chags kyis mdzes par byas pa'i rnam pa de tsam du 'od gang gis sdug pa lta bur lha'i 'od stong dang / 'od kyi rnam pa gzhan yang sngon po dang /
417a8(mdo sde): ser po dang / cod ka'i mdog tu 'byung ste/ tshal de kha dog bzang po yin no// las kyi mtha' spyad pa zhugs pa'i tshal de na/ me tog du mas bsgos pa'i dri shin tu zhim
417b1(mdo sde): po'i dang po'i rdzi 'byung ste/ gang gi tshe rdzi des lo ma de dag la phog par gyur pa de'i tshe/ rdzis phog pa'i lo me phan tshun reg pa las rol mo'i sgra 'byung ste/ de'i khyad par ni lha
417b2(mdo sde): ma yin gyi gnas na spyod pa'i rol mo dag bcu drug gi char yang mi phod pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag 'byung ngo // gang gi tshe lo ma re re la phog pa de'i tshe/ yang rol me'o sgra shin
417b3(mdo sde): tu chags su rung ba drug 'byung ste/ de sil snyan yan lag lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur la/ yul shin tu nyams dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis myos so// de nas
417b4(mdo sde): yang lo ma'i rol mi'i sgra des/ sred pa la chags shing dga' ba bag med pa brgya snyed la gnas par byed do// sgra la chags pa/ sgra la zhen pa/ sgras bslus pa de/
417b5(mdo sde): ji srid du de'i 'dod pa sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i las byas shing bsags pa/ zad par ma gyur pa de srid du/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya khyad par du sdug pa
417b6(mdo sde): dag myong bar byed do// de phyis lha'i ris de nas/ 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis/ sems can dmyal
417b7(mdo sde): ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/ mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rol mo mngon par dga'
417b8(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhing / nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / chung ma shin tu 'byor pa dang yun ring du 'tsho ba dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du yang bkur ba yang 'gyur ba mthong
418a1(mdo sde): ngo// de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des/ lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed// de ltar
418a2(mdo sde): lha dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur/ ming ni ci zhig bya snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ lha'i 'jig rten na lha rnams kyi gnas/ dris dregs dga'
418a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ sems shin tu
418a4(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ sems yongs su bsgoms pa gang gis/ mchod rten gyi bum pa 'am/ gdugs la dri chab phul na/ de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro the ris kyi
418a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten dris dregs dga'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang / lci'i bde ba dang ni ldan/ bde ba dpe med pa'i kha zas la ni rten/ lha'i bdud
418a6(mdo sde): rtsi'i zas kyis ni tshim/ lus dang yid kyi gdung ba dang ni bral/ lci'i phreng ba dang / gos gyon pa/ rtag tu sil snyan yan lag lngas/ rtsen cing dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang /
418a7(mdo sde): rtse ba'i grogs dang ldan pa lha me'i tshogs rnams ni glu dbyangs len/ nyin cig bzhin rgyun mi 'chad par ri sul las ni'i shags 'bab pa ltar bde ba rnams ni 'phel/
418a8(mdo sde): nor bu mthon ka dang / spug dang / dngul kye ri'i rtse mo rnams su dga' bar byed cing / chu bo dang / 'bab chu dang / lteng gi rnam pa sna tshogs ni mthang // tshal gyi nang na/
418b1(mdo sde): gnas pa/ bya dang / khu byug rnams kyang mthong ste/ lta ba du mi'i za lang bar lta ba/ tshal dang nags yid du 'ong ba rnams su lta bar byed kyang / sems tshim par byed pa
418b2(mdo sde): dag lha'i 'jig rten de na gnas so// chu bo dang 'bab chu dang / lteng ka dang / tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal rnams la mtho ris kyi rnyi'i ro gang dang gang 'byung ba dag ni/ 'di ltar 'dzam bu gling na/
418b3(mdo sde): legs par byas pa'i las kyis/ dgun chang dang / sbyar ba'i chang dang / sha kha ra'i chang gi ro 'byung ba rnam pa de lta bur 'byung ngo // de ltar legs par byas pa'i las kyi
418b4(mdo sde): mtha' spyad pa de/ lha'i 'jig rten na ji srid du de'i legs par lhas zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lha mo'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor ba dang / dga' bar byed do//
418b5(mdo sde): de phyis de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i nang du
418b6(mdo sde): ma skyes la/ rdza mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ de las de dang rgyu 'thun par bran khyim bdog cing nor dang 'bru mang po kun nas gang bar 'gyur ba mthong
418b7(mdo sde): ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin po shes pa de/ lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams la rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/
418b8(mdo sde): lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas rlung gis rgyu ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/
419a1(mdo sde): des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing / sems yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang
419a2(mdo sde): gis tsha bas gdungs pa'i dge slong rnams la/ rlung g.yab kyis rlung g.yabs te/ gang gis rlung 'byung ba reg na bde ba kun shi ba'i dri dang / 'dres pas dge slong shin tu
419a3(mdo sde): tsha bas gdungs pa de rnams rlung des bsam gtan dang / kha don 'don pa dang / 'jug par bya ba dag byed par nus na/ sbyin bdag de las byas pa'i rkyen des/ de lus
419a4(mdo sde): dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten rlung la spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' spyad pa de la
419a5(mdo sde): rlung dri zhim pa dpe med pa ldang ngo // gang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi rlung dpe med pa ldang ba 'ba' shig tu ma zad kyi/ lha'i ris gzhan nas rlung ldangs pa'i dro 'bum gyur
419a6(mdo sde): du zhim la shin tu gsal bar yang ldang ste/ rnam par smin pa bzang po gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga 'gyur du 'byung ngo // der rgyal chen
419a7(mdo sde): bzhi pa rnams kyi rlung ni gnyis gyur du byung ngo // rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams las lhag par sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi sum 'gyur du 'byung ngo // sum cu rtsa gsum
419a8(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi lhag par 'thab 'bral ba rnams kyi bzhi 'gyur du 'byung ngo // 'thab 'bral ba rnams las kyang lhag par dga' ldan pa rnams kyi lnga 'gyur du 'byung ngo //
419b1(mdo sde): dga' ldan pa rnams las lhag par 'phrul dga' rnams kyi drug 'gyur du 'byung ngo // de dag pas kyang lhag par gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams kyi yang 'byung ste/ der sems
419b2(mdo sde): can rnams kyi las kyi bye brag las 'gro ba'i ris kyi bye brag tu 'gyur ro// las byas pa de dag mngon par mthong nas/ legs par byas pa'i las des rlung la spyod pa'i
419b3(mdo sde): lha rnams la/ lha'i ris drug nas rlung langs pa dpe med pa dri zhim pa bde ba yin pa de dag ldang ngo // rlung de dag gi mthu gcig tsog bshad par bya ste/ 'di ltar
419b4(mdo sde): de'i mthu thams cad bshad par mi nus so// lha de rnams kyi dga' mgur byed pa ldang ste/ de ni gang gi tshe rol me'i sgra 'byung bar 'dod na de'i tshe rlung de ri dang nag
419b5(mdo sde): tshal gyi gseb du song nas ji ltar de lha mos rol mo byas pa cung zad kyang snyan par mi 'gyur bar de lta bur ldang ngo // gal te shin tu dri zhim par 'dod na/ de gzhan
419b6(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ris man chad kyi mdog dpe med pa dang ldan pa dag las lang nas lha rnams kyi drung du ldang bar byed do// gal te bsil bar 'dod na/ de ji ltar
419b7(mdo sde): de dag gi lus la bzod pa rnam pa de lta bu'i bsil ba ldang ngo // gal te yul gzhan du 'gro bar 'dod dam/ de bzhin du bai DUr+ya'i ri rab kyi rtse mo lta bar 'dod dam/
419b8(mdo sde): de bzhin du dngul gyi 'am/ de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i chu ba'i gser gyi 'am/ de bzhin du shel gyi 'am/ de bzhin du me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu bo dang /
420a1(mdo sde): 'bab chu dang / lteng ka dang / tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal bya ba dang / me tog nyams dga' ba'i yul sna tshogs blta bar 'dod pa dang /
420a2(mdo sde): lha po sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/ 'gro bar 'dod pa'i lha rnams la rlung sgra dang / dri dang / bde ba rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa de dag ldang bar byed do// tshal dang nye bar
420a3(mdo sde): tshal dang / dga' thub kyi tshal/ ri khrod rnam pa sna tshogs su snga ma bzhin khyer bar yang byed de/ de ltar rlung 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa lnga la dga'
420a4(mdo sde): ba'i lha rnams dang / lhan cig dga' bar byed/ rtse bar byed/ yongs su spyod par byed do// drag dag dang zab mo dag gis skyo ba med pa/ phan tshun grogs su
420a5(mdo sde): gyur pa/ phan tshun gnod pa med pa rnams yid bcugs shing gnas de dag la yid zhugs pa/ rang gi las kyis bsgyur ba rnams dga' bar byed do// lha'i 'jig rten na
420a6(mdo sde): lha rang gi las tha ma dang / 'bring dang bzang po rnams kyis rmyi'i 'bur lta bur las kyi 'bras bu 'byung ba ni/ ji ltar rlung phrag dog dang / ser sna dang bral ba'i shugs
420a7(mdo sde): 'byung la shugs zad nas sa la 'bab pa de ltar ji srid du las kyi rnam pa tha ma dang 'bring dang / bzang po legs par byas pa'i rnam pa de ji srid du 'byung ba'i shugs
420a8(mdo sde): spyad la/ de nas yang legs par byas pa'i las zad nas/ 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// sems can rnams ni las kyi skye gnas las skyes zhing las la
420b1(mdo sde): rton pa yin la/ ji ltar las byas pa de ltar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ sems can rnams kyi skye ba ni rgyu med pa las byung ba yin no// dge slong de las de dag mthong nas/ 'di
420b2(mdo sde): ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ji ltar nyi mi'i rjes su dus 'gyur zhing // ji ltar dus kyi rjes su shing rnams skye// / de ltar las kyi rjes su skye ba 'byung // rgyu med
420b3(mdo sde): pa la skye ba 'byung mi 'gyur// gang gis lus can bcings pa rnams// tshe rabs gzhan ni stong dag tu// rnam par chags pa mang po'i las// rnam gsum lu gu rgyud
420b4(mdo sde): kyis bcings// ji ltar sbrang rtsi dug dang zas// 'dres pa yongs su spong bar byed// de ltar lha'i bder gtogs pa// mtha' ni ltung ba rnam par spongs// gang zhig
420b5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal 'chi ba na// bsod nams zad de dman pa ni// rang gi chung ma rnams kyis spangs// de 'dra ba ni dpe med do// legs byas zad de dman pa ni// sgron ma
420b6(mdo sde): 'bar ba zad pa ltar// lha khyod gang du 'gro 'gyur zhes// sdug bsngal chen po rab tu bskyed// sred pa'i dug gis rnam bsregs shing // mya ngan gyis ni sems nyam
420b7(mdo sde): te// lus dang ngag gi spyod dman pa// lha ni ltung ba dag gis 'jigs// 'dod rnams shin tu slu byed de// ji lta ji ltar bde myangs pa/ de lta de ltar yongs su gtong /
420b8(mdo sde): de dag sdug bsngal rab tu che// lha'i yul nas ltung ba na// sdug bsngal rab tu skye ba gang // de'i khyad par sems can dmyal// bcu drug char yang mi bad do//
421a1(mdo sde): sred pas 'khor ba kun byas pa// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba rnams kyis klags/ sred pa'i sgrog gis bcings pa yin// sems can rnams
421a2(mdo sde): ni ngan 'gror 'gro// lha'i 'jig rten 'chi ba'i mtha'// de bzhin sa steng 'chi ba'i mtha'// 'khor ba las ni mi 'byung bas// sdug bsngal mthong nas rnam par
421a3(mdo sde): spongs// skye bo bag med dga' ba gang // de ni thar pa mi 'thob ste// bag med dug gis rmongs pa ni// de la mya ngan 'das pa min// bag med dkri' mchog yin
421a4(mdo sde): pas// bag med rnams la chags ma byed// shin tu bag med lha rnams ni// yang dang yang du dmyal bar ltung // gnas gsum 'khrul pa 'khor ba ltar//
421a5(mdo sde): 'khrul 'khor las kyis 'khyam par byed// de bsreg pa'i chags pa spangs// cha 'dod chags pa bla ba'i gnas// de ltar dge slong des lha'i 'jig rten gyi mtha'
421a6(mdo sde): ltung bar mthong nas/ 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral lo// rlung la spyod pa'i lha de rnams kyi mi rtag pa dang bde ba de dag la las kyi rgyus bskyed cing mi rtag
421a7(mdo sde): pa nyid dang 'brel pa yin pa lta zhes rnam par dpyod par byed do// lha de rnams kyang ji srid du// de'i legs par byas pa'i las zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na
421a8(mdo sde): dga' bar byed do// de phyis de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ ji ltar dus ji srid du legs par byas pa'i las yod dam/ 'od gsal ba 'gyur ba'i dus/ de srid
421b1(mdo sde): du lha rnams lha'i 'jig rten na spyod do// de zad nas ltung bar 'gyur la/ ltung nas kyang / yang sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur/
421b2(mdo sde): gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rlung gis bdas nas 'gro ba// rgya mtshor spyod cing 'tsho ba'i ded dpon du 'gyur
421b3(mdo sde): ba mthong ngo // / dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa// / bam po nyi shu bdun pa/
421b4(mdo sde): de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/ lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes
421b5(mdo sde): pas/ lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas me tog phreng dga' zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // der sems can dag gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/
421b6(mdo sde): des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing // lus dang ngag gi las kyi mtha' yang dag par sems pas yongs su
421b7(mdo sde): bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang gis tsha ba'i dus du dge 'dun la tshu ral ba gang phul ba 'am/ lam du zhugs pa 'am/ 'brog dgon par zhugs pa dag la yang /
421b8(mdo sde): chu ril ba gang byin na/ de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten me tog 'phreng la dga' ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang
422a1(mdo sde): de'i lus bde ba dang / sgeg pa sna tshogs su ni spyod// lha me sil snyan gyi sgra 'byin cing dgod pa sna tshogs kyi nang du ni zhugs/ bai DUr+ya dang /
422a2(mdo sde): gser dang dngul gyi ri rab kyi gshong na/ rtsen pa dag dang lhan cig ni gnas/ ri khrod rnam pa sna tshogs na lha mo dang ni lhan cig 'khod/ rlung dri zhim pos reg pa'i lus me
422a3(mdo sde): tog phreng ba thogs pa// 'bab chu dang lteng kas brgyan pa'i yul rnams na dga' bar byed cing lha mo mang po'i nang na spyod pa na/ lo 'bum phrag du ma song ba'o// de ltar
422a4(mdo sde): gnas pa de/ res 'ga' tshal 'bab chu zhes bya ba na gnas te/ tshal de ni bai DUr+ya'i shing ljon pa la gser gyi mdab ma yod pa dang / gser gyi shing la bai dur+ya'i mdab ma dag
422a5(mdo sde): yod de/ tshal de'i nang du zhugs pa/ de rtag par yid rab tu dga' la/ lus rang gi 'od dang ldan pa yin no// de'i legs par byas pa'i las des shing de dag brtol
422a6(mdo sde): pa las/ mtho ris dang 'thun pa'i skom 'byung ste/ bskom de'i khyad par ni mi'i rgun chang dang sbyar ba'i chang dang sha kha ri'i chang dag 'bras bu pi tsu man de'i ro dang mtshungs
422a7(mdo sde): te/ skom de ni lci'i ro dang mdog dang stobs dang ldan pa yin no// de'i dri dpag tshad du yang 'byung ste/ bya'i tshogs lus gser dang dngul gyi mdog lta bu yid rab tu
422a8(mdo sde): dga' ba kun gyis skom de 'thungs nas tshal de ni sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byin cing kun tu 'gengs so// shing de dag gi sdong po rtul nas skom 'byung ba de la bung ba'i
422b1(mdo sde): tshogs 'ub 'ub 'du ste/ skom kha cig gi mdog ni gser lta bu yin/ kha cig gi mdog ni bai dUr+ya lta bu yin/ kha cig gi mdog ni spug lta bu yin/ kha cig gi mdog/
422b2(mdo sde): ni pad ma ra ga lta bu yan/ kha cig gi mdog ni ma rgad lta bu yin te/ skom de dag kun nas 'byung nas brug pa chu bo ltar 'bab po// skom gyi chu de'i ming yang mtha' med 'bab
422b3(mdo sde): ces bya ste/ chu bo'i rgyar dpag tshad gnyis yod pa'i 'gram gnyi ga nyams dga' la/ 'gram gnyi ga lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing klu len la gser gyi
422b4(mdo sde): pad mas khebs pas 'bab po// de nas lha mo'i tshogs kyis 'thungs pa dang / yid rab tu dga' ste/ dgod par byed/ rtse bar byed cing / phan tshun gser gyis pad mi'i
422b5(mdo sde): sdong bu bai dur+ya rnams kyis sgeg par byed/ rtse bar byed/ dgod par byed do// shing rta sna tshogs la zhon pa rnams rgyug par byed la/ lha'i yul yan lag brgyad dang ldan
422b6(mdo sde): pas phan tshun 'thor bar byed do// lho de rnams kyi pad ma'i rdzing yod pa de ni kun bsten pa zhes bya la/ gzhan dang mi 'dra ba dpe med pa yin te/ legs par byas pa'i
422b7(mdo sde): las kyis bsgyur ba'i lha rnams ji srid du de'i 'dod pa sdug pa'i yid du 'ong ba'i las zad pa ma gyur pa de srid du gnas so// de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/
422b8(mdo sde): she nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la mi rnams dang skal pa
423a1(mdo sde): mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ de las de dang rgyu 'thun par bkres pa dang / skom pa yong ye med cing 'byor pa dang ldan pa'i yul du skyes la/ ner
423a2(mdo sde): dang shin tu ldan pa dang / skye bo thams cad la dga' bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/ lha lag na yol go thogs pa
423a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
423a4(mdo sde): der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing / legs par byas pa'i las
423a5(mdo sde): kyi mtha' spyad par gyur pa/ sems dpas yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying gis brlan pa/ skyo ba med cing shin tu dga' ba'i sems pa gang bdag la phan pa med kyang / tshul khrims
423a6(mdo sde): 'chal ba'i nad pa'i rim 'gro byed na de lus dang bral nas/ bde 'gro mthe ris kyi 'jig rten kun tu lta ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang / lha'i
423a7(mdo sde): 'phreng ba dang / gos gyon pa rab tu dga' ba de/ lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor pa'i bde ba dang ni ldan/ yid rtag tu dga' ba/ lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams
423a8(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dang / skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal du rgyu/ dga' mgur gnas pa grogs sdug gu lha mo'i tshogs du mas bskor cing yongs su spyod par ni byed/ nyi ma'i 'od
423b1(mdo sde): lngar ni gsal/ dge ba ni rgya cher 'phel/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis ni mchod// ri rab ni rin po che du mi'i 'od kyis gsal bar byas shing / rab tu 'bar ba dag la/
423b2(mdo sde): ni gnas/ gos mtshon can rnam pa sna tshogs ni bgos/ mtho ris dang 'thun pa'i rin po che du ma dag gis rgyan gdags par bya ba ni btags/ tshal na rnam par
423b3(mdo sde): rgyu bi'i lha bsams pa'i tshal gribs pa sna tshogs dag na ni gnas/ pad ma'i rdzing dang / lteng ka dang / chu dngos dang / 'bab chu dang / chu bo dang / 'bab kyi
423b4(mdo sde): rgyun dang / stegs sna tshogs dag la rnam par rgyu ba na/ rang gi las rnams kyis las kyi bya ba byed do// de ltar de yongs su rgyu ba na/ phyogs gzhan zhig na tshal
423b5(mdo sde): dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas gtibs shing gser gyi lan kan bres pa zhig der mthong ste/ bya rnam pa sna tshogs gnas pa/ byi'i tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa
423b6(mdo sde): 'byin pa rnams kyis ni kun tu gang / rlung gis phog nas rab tu g.yos pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra ni drag tu 'khrol/ nyi ma 'bum snyed kyi 'od dang ni ldan/
423b7(mdo sde): ri ra ba las byung ba'i gser gyi ri bdun la/ 'di lta ste/ shin tu mthe dang / rab sbyor dang / char dga' dang / klus brtol dang rab chags gsal dang / rin chen char
423b8(mdo sde): 'bebs dang / rgyu skar phreng gis yongs su bskur ba/ dril bu g.yer ki 'dra bas gtags pa'i tshal der 'jug par byed do// rnam pa de lta bu'i tshal lci 'phreng ba la sog/
424a1(mdo sde): pas rnam par brgyan pa de na/ lha me'i tshal gyi gsab gseb na rgyu zhing rtse ba gang yin pa de dag 'od zer 'bum snyed byung ba ltar
424a2(mdo sde): tshal de na snang ngo // shing ldan pa'i bar na 'khod pa'i lha de dag gis// de rnams mthong nas/ de nas yang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la/ blo rnam par chags pa dag blta ba'i
424a3(mdo sde): phyir de'i drung du 'dong zhing shin tu rgyug par byed do// gser gyi pad ma rnams kyis/ de dag la rtse bar byed/ yongs su spyod par byed/ dgod par byed/ sgeg par byed la
424a4(mdo sde): rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis kyang shin tu dga' bar byed do// de ltar 'dod pa la blo rnam par chags pa de/ mig lha'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis chog mi shes so//
424a5(mdo sde): rna ba sgra snyan pa gsal ba yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis chog mi shes so// sna dri zhim pa gsum che ba yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis chog mi shes so// lces ro zhim pa bro ba mang
424a6(mdo sde): ba yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis chog mi shes so// pags pa reg bya bde ba/ 'jam pa yid la yid 'ong rnams kyis chog mi shes te/ sred pa drug gi mes yongs su bskor
424a7(mdo sde): ba de kun nas sreg par byed do// de ltar chog mi shes pa de/ dge slong des mngon par mngon par mthong nas/ 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ lha'i 'jig rten
424a8(mdo sde): kun nas su// sred pa'i ma yis yongs su bskar// blangs pa 'dod pa'i dbang song ba// chags pa dbang med sreg par byed// ji lta ji ltar shing rnyed na// de la de ltar
424b1(mdo sde): sreg pa 'phel// ji lta ji ltar bde thob na// de lta de ltar sred me 'phel// shing med sreg pa'i nyes pa rnams// mi yis yongs su spang nus kyi// 'jig rten sred mes sreg pa ni//
424b2(mdo sde): yongs su spang bar mi nus so// chu bo chen po rgal 'dod la// chu srin gyis ni 'jigs pa gang // de dag bde ba'i mthar phyin na// sred pas de la gnod mi 'gyur// sred pa'i zhabs
424b3(mdo sde): las rnam grol zhing // 'dod chags zhe sdang spong ba po// nyes sdig las ni grol ba gang // mkhas pa de ni mya ngan bral// gang zhig tshul khrims srung ba nyid//
424b4(mdo sde): mthe ris de la yid zhugs na// de dag tshul khrims sdig dang bcas// zas dang dug ni 'dres pa bzhin// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su// sred pas bslus pa'i
424b5(mdo sde): mi rnams ni// shin tu rmongs pas de mi gtong // yi de ni gti mug dbang du song // skom gyi gdungs pa'i khu btsa ba// lan tsA'i chu ni 'thung ba ltar// sred pas bslus
424b6(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams// sred pa nyid kyi rjes su 'brang // skye bo skad cig tshim byed la// skad cig gis ni skom byed pa// skyes bu tha ma sred pa yis// gdungs pa
424b7(mdo sde): lam gol tshol ba bzhin// de bas sred pa bsten mi bya// srid pa de ni bsnyen par dga'// sred pa'i dbang du song ba'i mi// 'khor ba las ni 'grol mi 'gyur//
424b8(mdo sde): gang zhig bde ba bla na med// bsam gtan bskyed mos tshal la dga'// mya ngan 'das pa'i grong ston pa// de dag bde ba bzhin du 'gyur// bde ba bla na med pa rnams//
425a1(mdo sde): lha yul spyad pa'i skye bo dag/ sred pa'i zhags pas drangs nas su// yang dang yang du dmyal bar ltung // 'chi mtha' dang por dge ba
425a2(mdo sde): min// yang dag lam ni ston mdzad pas// sred pa dag tu sten byed pa// 'di yi sdug bsngal tsha zhes gsungs// de ltar dge slong des lha'i 'jig rten 'dod pa'i dpa' rlabs
425a3(mdo sde): kyis bdebs shing // 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mngon par mthong nas/ 'khor ba la yid byung ngo // de ltar lha de srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i
425a4(mdo sde): las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du gnas kun tu lta ba dag na/ dga' bar byed do// de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs
425a5(mdo sde): gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i nang du skyes la/ mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mi'i
425a6(mdo sde): nang du skyes na/ de las de dang rgyu 'thun par bu dang / chung ma dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / rtag tu ldan zhing //
425a7(mdo sde): shin tu 'byor par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/ lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas
425a8(mdo sde): la rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas/ rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug
425b1(mdo sde): pa mthong ngo // der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cing /
425b2(mdo sde): sems pa gsal ba'i snying dang ldan pa gang gis rgyal pos gsad par bya ba btson ri'i nang du bcug pa las/ nor rdzas thams cad phul na/ de thar par byas sam//
425b3(mdo sde): de bzhin du rgyal po'i bu 'am/ de dang 'thun pa dag la phul nas/ thar par byas la/ de las nor rdzas sna 'ga' yang len par mi byed de/ snying rjes brlan pa'i snying
425b4(mdo sde): gis sems can rnams la phan par byed cing legs par byas na/ de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten rtag tu dga' ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye
425b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang lha rnams ngo bo nyid kyis yid rab tu dga' ba yin la/ de dag pas kyang de brgya 'gyur du yid rab tu dga' bar 'gyur te//
425b6(mdo sde): las de dang mthun par 'bras bu 'byung ngo // lha'i 'jig rten der skyes pa de/ lha mo'i tshogs mang pos ni yongs su bskor/ glu dbyangs dang bro gar dang /
425b7(mdo sde): gzhad gang dang / rtsed mo dang / dga' mgur spyod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis ni mtha' 'khor te/ nye bar spyod cing ri rab dang / ri dang ri phug dang / dur khrod rnams
425b8(mdo sde): ni n+ya/ bai dUr+ya'i leb bzang po reg na bde ba rnams kyi steng na rang dgar ni spyod/ chu bo dang 'bab tu dang / lteng ka dang / tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal rnams su shin tu
426a1(mdo sde): bde ba dang ldan pa dga' bar byed pa/ bde ba de'i khyed par ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i bde bas 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
426a2(mdo sde): ris mthun pa de dang / sha dang rus pa dang / chu ser dang bral ba de'i phyir bde'o// lha'i rin po che'i phreng ba dang gos du ma gyon pa/ me tog brgyas pa dang / bgo ba sna tshogs
426a3(mdo sde): kyis lus brgyan pa de ri rab kyi drang dag na rgyu bar byed de/ gal te gser gyi zom la 'dzegs na/ gser de'i mthus de gser lta bur 'gyur ro// gal te bai dur+ya'i ri'i zom
426a4(mdo sde): 'dzegs na/ bai dUr+ya de'i mthus/ de bai du ri'i mdog lta bur 'gyur te/ bdag nyid mtsho'i nang du zhugs pa ltar gyur kyang / 'dam rdzab kyis gos pa lta bur ni mi 'gyur
426a5(mdo sde): ro// gal te shel gyi zom la 'dzegs na/ shel gyi 'od des zla ba gnyis pa lta bur 'gyur ro// gal te dngul gyi ri'i zom la 'dzegs na/ dngul de'i mthus de'i yan
426a6(mdo sde): lag dang nying lag thams cad/ kha ba dang me tog ku mu da ltar 'gyur te/ de ltar lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i tshal dang /
426a7(mdo sde): nye ba'i tshal rnams su dga' bar byed/ yongs su spyod par byed cing / lha'i bde ba dpe med pa dag myong bar byed do// de ltar de rnam par skyed pa na/ shing rnam pa du mas
426a8(mdo sde): mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i nyams dga' bar byengad nul zhes bya ba zhig rgyang ring po nas mthong ba dang / de ltar de dag 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi shing rta la zhon nas 'gro
426b1(mdo sde): bar byed do// tshal de yang bya rnam pa sna tshogs sgra 'byin cing / tshal gyi lcug ma gzhon nu 'phyang ba dag tu shing rtas byin pa dang / bya lci'i skad du rtse ba zhes bya ba lha rnams dang
426b2(mdo sde): smra ba mthun pa dag lha de'i dge ba'i las kyi mthus bskul ba dang / 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa// dga' bar byed pa'i las rnams dag/ skyes bu gang zhig 'dir
426b3(mdo sde): byed pa// de'i las kyi rnam smin ni// legs par yongs su smin par 'gyur// bde ba thob pa'i lha de dag/ bag med pa la sten na ni// de ni bde las bde 'thob cing //
426b4(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das pa'i rjes su 'gro// bde ba'i mtha' de zad 'gyur zhing // 'di la rtag dang ther zug med// de thob gzhal med khang rnams la// skyes bu mchog rnams
426b5(mdo sde): chags ma byed// bde mtha' rtag tu ltung 'gyur zhing // bde la rtag pa nyid med na// rgyu de thams cad rag nas su// yid la nges par legs pa byos// bsags
426b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad tha mar zad// mtho ba'i mtha' ni tha mar rnyil// 'du ba'i mtha' ni tha mar 'bral// mtsho ba'i mtha' ni tha mar 'chi// skye ba rtag tu 'chi 'gyur zhing //
426b7(mdo sde): de la rtag pa nyid med cing // khams gsum dag tu sngon byung zhes// phyi nas 'byung ba nyid med do// ji ltar nyi ma 'char ba dang // nub par 'gyur ba rab tu mngon//
426b8(mdo sde): de ltar skye ba thams cad kyi// tha mar 'chi ba gnas pa yin// chos rnams kyi ni ngo bo nyid// skye dang 'jig pa 'di shes nas// bag med yid la ma byed cig
427a1(mdo sde): bag med dug gi mchog yin no// bag yod 'chi med gnas yin la// bag med 'chi ba'i gnas yin no// bag yod 'chi bar mi 'gyur
427a2(mdo sde): la/ bag med rnams ni rtag tu 'chi// ji ltar dug dang ji ltar med// srog chags bag med de bzhin te// bag med mos pa'i sems can rnams// sdug las sdug
427a3(mdo sde): bsngal de 'gro'o// rtag tu bag yod mi rnams ni// 'jig rten kun gyis phyag byas shing // gang la bag med mi gnas pa// zhi ba mchog tu 'gro bar byed// bde
427a4(mdo sde): kun mtha' ni zad 'gyur te// rmongs pa gang zhig mi rig pa// de ni phyi nas 'chi 'gyur tshe// ma byas don med gdungs par byed// rtag tu bdag nyid dga' 'dod
427a5(mdo sde): na// 'chi ba'i bar du dge ba byos// chos spyod bde ba yin no zhes// mkhas pa rnams kyis gtams pa yin// rgyu de nyid rnam ston pa// sangs rgyas rnams
427a6(mdo sde): kyis 'khor ba kun// rtag tu mi rtag mi brtan la// 'gyur zhing tsha bar rtag tu gsungs// de nas lha des bya de rnams kyi tshig thos nas// yang dag par bsams te/
427a7(mdo sde): yid la yang dga' ba bskyed pa dang / sngon gyi tshe'i 'bras bu dran nas// yud tsam zhig bag med pa la ma zhugs so// mos pa'i sgyogs kyis yid de 'dzin
427a8(mdo sde): par byed de/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya yid du 'ong ba rnams la bag med pa ma skyes so// de nas yang yid mi brtan pa de lha
427b1(mdo sde): bde ba'i dbang du gyur te/ ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba de ma zad kyi bar du/ de yul sdug pa de rnams la spyod par byed do// de phyis lha yul de nas 'chi bar/
427b2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/ mi rnams
427b3(mdo sde): dang skal pa mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na de las de dang rgyu 'thun par/ nams kyang bcings par mi 'gyur zhing / rtag tu bde ba dang ldan la/ nyamo nga ba rnams las
427b4(mdo sde): thar par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des/ lha lag na yol go thogs pa/ rnams kyi gnas la rtog par
427b5(mdo sde): byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas/ dri la chags pa zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // /
427b6(mdo sde): der sems can las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ skyes bu tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ sems
427b7(mdo sde): dpas yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying dang yid shin tu dang ba/ sems rnyog pa med par gyur pa// gzhan la gnod pa med pa gang gis/ sangs rgyas sam/ chos
427b8(mdo sde): sam/ dge 'dun la zhing chen por shes nas/ gos shin tu dri zhim pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas la/ legs par byas so snyam du yang sems na/ de lus dang bral/
428a1(mdo sde): nas bde 'gro mthe ris kyi 'jig rten dri la chags pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang shin tu bde ba dang / rang
428a2(mdo sde): gi 'od dang ldan pa/ sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas yid rab tu dga' mgur spyod pa des dus ring me zhig 'das so// dus ring po 'das pa de yang yul gyi bde ba
428a3(mdo sde): des lha de dag gis mi rig ste/ gang bdag gi dus 'di 'das so zhes// dbang po dang bde ba mi brtan pa/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa'i yul rnams mchog mi shes
428a4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis mi rig go/ de ltar snying la chags pa/ me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / byug pas lus bskus pa de/ tshal gyi bar bar dag na rgyu bar byed la/
428a5(mdo sde): shing ljon pa mang po'i 'od kyis brgyan pa/ chu bo dang / stegs dang / tshal dang / bskyed mos tshal dag gis brgyan pa'i yul nyams dga' ba'i tshal rnams la sten
428a6(mdo sde): par byed pa/ 'dod pa mang po la snying chags pa dag yul gyi bde ba des/ lha'i 'jig rten gyi mtha' 'di ltung bar khong du mi chud do// de ltar yul gyi sred pas yongs
428a7(mdo sde): su bslus pa de/ ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba/ byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du lci'i 'jig rten de dag na dga' bar byed/
428a8(mdo sde): yongs su spyod par byed do// de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi// sems can
428b1(mdo sde): dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/ mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ las de dang rgyu 'thun par/ yul rtag tu bsil
428b2(mdo sde): bar skye bar 'gyur te/ yul gnod pa med pa dang / mtshon cha dang / dgon pa dang / lo nyes byung ba dang / bral ba'i yul rnams su skye la/ skye bo kun gyis mchod
428b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par shes pa de/ lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed do// des
428b4(mdo sde): thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas lha'i mig gis/ lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas spyi gtsug thar ces bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // der sems can
428b5(mdo sde): dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ rgyal po la gnod pa byed pa'i mi sri gtsug nas bzung ste/ spangs
428b6(mdo sde): pa sdug bsngal ba las gang gis de thar par byas na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten spyi gtsug thar ces bya ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyuraro//
428b7(mdo sde): rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas gsum gyi nang na de'i nyams dga' ba/ shin tu yid du 'ong ba/ 'dod pa la rten po/ de'i ngo bo 'dod pa/ 'dod pa nye bar mchod pa/ 'dod
428b8(mdo sde): brgyan chad pa med pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byung la/ bde ba'i gnas de na/ bde ba des mngon par 'dad pa/ ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba bya/
429a1(mdo sde): shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du/ de na lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba de/ sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan
429a2(mdo sde): zhing yul gyi bde ba dang / nyams bde ba des/ dga' bar byed do// de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang gal te len grangs gzhan la myong bar
429a3(mdo sde): 'gyur bar las kyis/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/ mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ de las dang rgyu
429a4(mdo sde): 'thun par mya ngan dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang bral bar 'gyur la/ skyon med pa dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / skye bo thams cad dga' ba dang / shin tu
429a5(mdo sde): 'byor pa dang ldan pa dang / dus dang 'thun pa'i gzugs bzang ba dang / tshe'i bar chad med par 'chi bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong de gnas bcu mthar
429a6(mdo sde): chags su rtog par byed de/ lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams de tsam du zad dam zhes rtog par byed do// de nas gnas bcu las gnas gzhan bcu gcig pa med de// lha
429a7(mdo sde): lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas bcu ni de dag nyid yin par mthong ngo // des lha lag na yol go thogs pa rnams kyi gnas bcu ma lus par brtags nas/
429a8(mdo sde): rgyal chen bzhi'i nang na che ba/ gnas gsum pa rtag tu myos gnas shes bya ba thams cad la rtog par byed de/ lha rtag tu myos gnas de dag gi gnas ji tsam zhig yod
429b1(mdo sde): zhi gu snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ rtag tu myos gnas de dag gi gnas kyang bcu yod de/ 'di lta ste/ lhag par dga' ba dang / ud
429b2(mdo sde): dpal mdog dang / pad ma dkar spyod dang / grong khyer dmar gnas dang sna tshogs dang mtho bar gnas dang / dgun cang myos gnas dang / yul la 'dod pa dang /
429b3(mdo sde): chu bsil gnas dang / brtan dga' ste/ lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas ni bcu po de dag yin no// gnas gzhan gang zhig tu las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/
429b4(mdo sde): des thos pa las byung ba'i shes brtags na/ sems shin tu dang zhing snying la rnyog pa med pa dang / sems bzang po yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan pa gang gis shing ljon
429b5(mdo sde): pa chen po gang la/ yi dwags gnod sprin dang / srin po dag gnas pa'i shing ljon pa de gcod pa na yongs su skye bar byed la/ ya dwags dang gnod sbyin dang /
429b6(mdo sde): srin pa de dag gnas dang bral bas 'tsho bar mi byed de/ de'i mthus bde bar gnas na/ de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mthe ris kyi gnas lhag par dga' ba'i lha
429b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang / de gnas gzhan de na chu sil ba zhes bya ba'i rdzing bu yangs pa gser gyi mdog dang ldan pa/ bya ngang pa dang /
429b8(mdo sde): ka ran da ba dang / dur ba lus gser gyi mdog can 'byin pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma rab tu mang po rnams kyis mdzes par
430a1(mdo sde): byas pa yin no// pad mi'i rdzing bu bsil ba de dag na yang kun nas gser gyi tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ pad mi'i rdzing de gser dang dngul
430a2(mdo sde): gyi shing ljon pa rnams kyis kun dkris shing skor nas skye'o// shing de rnams kyang pad mi'i rdzing gi chu de'i nang na de rnams kyi grib ma 'bab pa'i gzugs du ma gzugs
430a3(mdo sde): brnyan lta bur snang la/ pad ma'i rdzing de yang ni'i nang du shing ljon pa'i grib ma de rnams kyis gzugs brnyan lta bur snang ngo // de yang pad ma dang / me tog u pa la dang /
430a4(mdo sde): ku mu das mdzes par byas pa de dag ni/ ji ltar brgya byin yang der rtse bar blo skye ba de ltar mdzes pa yin no// gang gi tshe lha dang lha ma yin gang g.yul 'gyed par 'bas pa na nyi
430a5(mdo sde): ma shar ba'i mdog lta bu'i pad ma 'bum phrag du mas mdzes par byas pa de rnams mthong ste/ brtags nas lha rnams la smras pa/ kye ma 'di lta bur chu bsil ba'i rdzing bu skyon med
430a6(mdo sde): pa 'di ni shin tu nyams dga' dga' ba yin no// de nas yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i rdzing bu de rnams su yid rab tu dga' zhing / rdzing bri'i 'gram du yid la rab tu mgu ba'i
430a7(mdo sde): lha dang lha me'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams sil bstan yan lag lnga dang ldan zhing bde ba dang dpe med pa dang ldan pa/ ci dga' mgur spyod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su
430a8(mdo sde): bskor ba/ shin tu bde dang ldan pa kha zas dang gnas dang / rang dgar za zhing 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed/ yongs su spyod par byed do// de nas byung nas gal te de nas
430b1(mdo sde): gzhan dud 'gro 'dod pa/ lus dang sems gdung ba rnams dang bral ba/ sems shin tu dga' ba/ bde ba shin tu rgya che zhing 'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams lha dang lha mo'i tshogs dgod cing glu len
430b2(mdo sde): la/ bro gar byed pa dang / ldan pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing / rtag tu rtse ba na/ lha'i lus dang yid la bde ba gang dang gang dag 'dod pa de dang de dag nyon mongs pa med cing
430b3(mdo sde): shin tu rgyas pa dang / tshegs chung ngus 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga yul lnga dang spyod pa'i yang bde ba la gnas pa des tshim mi myong bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sred pa
430b4(mdo sde): me lta bu dag la smod pa de/ yul gang gis kyang tshim par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar ri dang / skyed mos tshal dang / chu bo dang / gzhal med khang dang / lted ka dang / chu dang rnam pa
430b5(mdo sde): sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyis mdzes par byas pa dang / bya rnam pa sna tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin cang 'don pa rnams su/ lha de grogs dang lhan cig bde ba du ma la gan
430b6(mdo sde): shing / bye dUr+ya'i tshal gyi grib ma mdzes par byas pa/ dag na bya rnam pa sna tshogs sgra 'byin cing 'don pa'i tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal rnams na/ dga' bar byed/ rtse bar byed//
430b7(mdo sde): mgu bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// bai DUr+ya dang / gser dang / dngul dang / byi ru'i ri rab kyi zom dag la rang dgar 'khor ba/ kha cig ni nyi ma ltar gzi brjid
430b8(mdo sde): che kha cig ni zla ba ltar mdangs gsal/ kha cig ni gzugs dpe med pa dang ldan pa te/ ji ltar legs par byas pa'i las de rnams kyis lus mngon par bsgrubs pa de ltar/
431a1(mdo sde): lha yul du yang rnam par mdzes pa yin no// rgyu rkyen dang 'thun par spyod pa de srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de
431a2(mdo sde): srid du lha'i 'jig rten de na/ sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas/ dga' bar byed/ rtse bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de'i phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/
431a3(mdo sde): shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam
431a4(mdo sde): par mi'i nang du skyes na/ de las de dang rgyu 'thun par shin tu nyams dga' ba'i yul lo legs shing bde bar skye la/ shin tu 'byor pa dang ldan zhing mchog tu bde bar 'gyur ba
431a5(mdo sde): mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/ lha rtag tu myos gnas kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/
431a6(mdo sde): lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas ud dpal mdog ces bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa
431a7(mdo sde): las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ chos dang ldan zhing chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa gang gis/ 'di ltar me tog ud pa la bskyed pa 'dis/
431a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rnams kyi longs spyod bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ bskyed la de yang dbul bar byed cing sems la dga' bar yang 'dzin na/ de lus
431b1(mdo sde): dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten ud pa la mdog gi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang lha yul du rtse ba'i skye ba dang / dag mgur spyod pa de
431b2(mdo sde): dga' ya yar rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang steg dang / 'dze ba dang / rol mo'i sgra dang klu dbyangs dang bro gar byed pa dang ni ldan bde ba du la ni gnas/ tshal nas tshal dang / bye du ri
431b3(mdo sde): tshal gyi grib ma mdzes pa dang / gser gtse ma dang / byi ru lta bu'i sa bzhi bde ba/ mthon dman ran pa rnams ni rgyu/ lha mo'i tshogs du ma si yongs su bskor/ kha zas zhim
431b4(mdo sde): pe ni za/ ci dga' mgur spyod pa bsams pa tsam gyis ni grub/ ngo bo nyid kyis ri du ma la ni gnas/ bde ba las mchog tu bde ba ni thob/ dbang po lnga yul lnga ni chags
431b5(mdo sde): shing / dga' ba ni nyin cig bzhin nyams dga' bar byed// ud pa la sngon po dang / bai dur+ya'i mdog lta bu'i lus ni ud pa li'i tshal gnas su ud pa li'i tshal du rgyu
431b6(mdo sde): ud pa li'i dri gang de dpag tshad brgyar ni ldang / ud pa li'i dri zhim po des lha'i me tog dri zhim po gzhan thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ rgyal po bzhin du mdzes/ rgyu dang
431b7(mdo sde): 'thun par 'brel pa'i rims kyis rgyu dang 'thun par 'bras bu 'byung la/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs te/ de mtho ris su phyin nas me tog
431b8(mdo sde): ud pa la de rnams las dga' ba rnam pa du ma 'thob po// de nas ltar spyod cing bde ba la gnas pa'i dbang po drug nges par 'byung ba la dga' ba/ ji srid du 'dod pa
432a1(mdo sde): sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du de na dga' bar byed do// de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas
432a2(mdo sde): 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las gyis/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la mi
432a3(mdo sde): rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mi nang du skyes la/ de las de dang rgyu 'thun par me tog mang po bskyed cing 'byor pa'i yul rnams su skye bar 'gyur la/ shin tu rgya che ba dang
432a4(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / mchog tu bde ba dang ldan pa dang / gnod pa med par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/ lha rtag tu myos gan+da
432a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/ lha yul na rtag tu myos gnas kyi gnas// pad ma kar spyod ces bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
432a6(mdo sde): des sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cig/ lus dang ngag gi dri ma dang
432a7(mdo sde): bral ba/ sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang gis/ sangs rgyas sam chos sam/ dge 'dun la me tog 'bul ba'i don du pad ma'i tshal bskyed cing sangs
432a8(mdo sde): rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la yang sems dad pa dang ldan par gyur na/ de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi gnas/ pad ma dkar spyod kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar
432b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang / legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa de/ 'di lta ste/ rgyan dang rin po che dang / 'od sna tshogs kyis ni lus brgyan/ lha'i tshogs
432b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyis ni mchod/ lha mo'i tshogs me tog phreng ba thogs pa thams cad kyis ni yongs su bskor rdo rje dang / mthon ka dang ma rgad dang / sdug dang / phyang 'phrul gyi 'od kyis ni
432b3(mdo sde): lus brgyan/ dga' ya yar rab tu dga' zhing rtse bar ni gnas/ mthe ris dang 'thun pa'i kun dga' ra bar gnas shing / bde ba rtag tu myong ste/ ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa
432b4(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba'i las byas shing bsags pa'i las de'i zad par ma gyur pa de srid du bde ba dpe med pa rnam pa du ma yon tan shin tu tshe dang ldan pa/ skye bo thams cad dang lhan cig gzhan
432b5(mdo sde): la gnod pa med cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa rnam pa sna tshogs de dag myong bar byed do// de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang gal te lan grang
432b6(mdo sde): gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/ mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na//
432b7(mdo sde): de las de dang rgyu 'thun par nor gyi bdag por shin tu bde ba dang / ldan zhing bung ba dang dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang / rgyal pos kyang bskur bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de
432b8(mdo sde): nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de// lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyis gnas la rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/
433a1(mdo sde): lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas dmar gnas shes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // gnas der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur
433a2(mdo sde): snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ sems pa dang ldan pa/ phan par 'dod pa/ gus pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang yin pa des dge slong yang dag par
433a3(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba'i chos gos// shing phyis pa li'i shun pas kha dog dmar por bsgyur tam/ gur kum 'am btsod dam/ mtshal lam/ skyu ru ra 'am/ btsag gam/ bab la
433a4(mdo sde): 'am/ ldong ros 'am/ me tog pan d+has sam/ sa tshur dang bcas pas kha dog dmar por bsgyur na/ de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten grong khyer dmar
433a5(mdo sde): gnas kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang 'phreng ba dang gos dmar por gyon pa de'i gnas de ni 'od kyis brgyan pa'i lus kyis rtag tu bsal
433a6(mdo sde): bar byas pa yin la/ lha de dag thams cad kyang dga' mgur spyod pa yin la/ de rnams kyis mthus gnas de dag thams cad rnam pa de lta bur dmar bar 'gyur ro//
433a7(mdo sde): ji ltar pad ma ra ga'i 'od de gos pa med pa ltar/ lha de rnams kyang de ltar dmar por 'gyur ro// rgyan gyi kha dog sngon po dang / ser pos 'dres shing rin po ches klubs pa
433a8(mdo sde): gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang dmar por 'gyur te// legs par byas pa'i las de'i gos bsal ba rnams kyis dmar por 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe brtse zhing gzhal
433b1(mdo sde): med khang dang pad ma'i tshal dang lteng ka dang / tshal dang nye ba'i tshal sna tshogs dang / lha mo'i cha byad dang / rgyan dmar po sna tshogs thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba dag yul
433b2(mdo sde): du mar 'gro ba na/ de'i tshe de dag gi rgyan rnams kyi mtshon rtsi bsal ba dang / kha dog thams cad kyang gsal bar snang ngo // rin po che 'od sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ lha'i
433b3(mdo sde): lus de tshal nas tshal dang / ri'i zom nas ri'i zom dang / pad ma'i tshal nas pad mi'i tshal dang / chu bo dang 'bab chu dang lteng ka dang / nye ba'i tshal nas chu bo dang 'bab
433b4(mdo sde): nu dang / lteng ka dang / nye ba'i tshal du 'gro bar byed do// sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu dbyangs nye bar len cing / phan tshun grogs su gyur pa/ so sor chags
433b5(mdo sde): ba'i snying gis dga' bar byed/ brtse bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do// sred pa'i tshogs drug gis yid rab tu dga' ba dang / bdud rtsi'i zas bzang po la ni za/
433b6(mdo sde): myos pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i btung ba zhim po ni tshim par 'thungs te/ de srid du tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor nas/ dga' ba sna tshogs byed do// de ltar de dag rtse
433b7(mdo sde): ba sna tshogs dge slong des mngon par mthong nas/ 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mtho bas mtho ba rtag tu dge// lha mchog rnams kyi 'og min du// dge bas skye
433b8(mdo sde): dgu khrid par byed// rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yin// tshul khrims dag kyang bsrungs nas ni/ dge ba'i las kyi rnam smin 'di// lha rnams nang du smin par 'gyur/
434a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims chu ni shin tu dang // rab tu gang bar kun nas su// khrus byas mi ni lha rnams kyi// bde ba'i drung du 'gro bar 'gyur// sbyin dang
434a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims rtag tu dul// 'byung po kun la phan par dga'// ye shes brtson la byams sems ldan// lha'i 'dun sar 'gro bar 'gyur// nyes bcom byed dang ldan pa
434a3(mdo sde): dang / tshul khrims rin po che yis brgyan// sems can kun la brtse ldan pa// lha yul rnams na de dag mkhas// drang po rnams ni gser 'dra ste// dri ma dang ni sdig rnams
434a4(mdo sde): sbyangs// yang dag las kyis mtha' brtson pa// lha yul rnams na de dag mkhas// sems can la kun rtse ldan zhing // sems can kun la phan 'dod pa// sdig kun rnam
434a5(mdo sde): par spangs pa gang // de dag lha'i gnas na gnas// legs par rtog pa nyin cig bzhin// tshul khrims srung bar byed pa gang / nyin cig bzhin du de rnams kyi// bde
434a6(mdo sde): ba du ma de dag myong // skyes bu de dag nyid sems pa// tshul khrims rta la zhon na ni// rtsen pa du ma ldan pa dag/ lha'i gnas su 'gro bar byed// gang zhig lci'i gnas na
434a7(mdo sde): rtsed gang zhig bde ba bla na med/ de dag 'thun par tshul khrims kyi// 'bras bur de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// gang zhig lci'i phreng rgyan dang // lha'i phreng bas
434a8(mdo sde): klubs pa dang // lha rnams mtho ris su rtse ba ni// de kun rtse ba'i rgyu las byung // pad+ma ud pal nyams dga' tshal// tshal dang nags tshal brgyan pa dang // mtho ris
434b1(mdo sde): lha rnams dga' ba dang // de kun dge las skyes pa'i 'bras// na mkha' gzhal med khang gnas pa// lha'i rin chen brgyan pa dang // lha rnams dri med gsal ba gang /
434b2(mdo sde): de dag tshul khrims 'bras bu yin// gser dang me tog sna tshogs dang // kun nas ri bo'i steng rnams su// lha rnams dga' byed gang yin de// tshul khrims las byung 'bras
434b3(mdo sde): bu yin// ji ltar mi dag rang khyim du// zhugs nas 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// de bzhin tshul khrims yang dag spong// mi rnams lha'i gnas su 'gro// 'di ltar lha'i gnas
434b4(mdo sde): su 'gro ba'i dri// bla med tshul khrims ldan pa'i dri zhim pa// me tog ke ta ka dang ma lu ka// tsam pa ki'i dri dang mtshungs pa min// tshul khrims yongs su bsrung ba gang /
434b5(mdo sde): de dag 'tsho ba'i phul yin no// gang zhig tshul khrims yongs spong ba// 'chi ba'i nang na mi bzad 'chi// bdag la rtag tu byams 'dod pa'ang // yon tan 'di dag rig na
434b6(mdo sde): su/ tshul khrims legs par bsrung byar zhing // tshul khrims 'chal pa rnam par spongs// tshul khrims bsrung ba rtag tu dul// bzod pa ldan zhing blta na bsdug
434b7(mdo sde): them skas lta bur 'dzegs nas su// lha'i mdun sar 'gro bar byed// de ltar dge slong des rang gi las la spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang mthong bar byed// las kyi 'bras bu sna
434b8(mdo sde): tshogs kyang mthong nas// 'khor ba las 'dod chags dang bral lo// grong khyer dmar po na gnas pa'i lha de dag kyang // ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba legs par/
435a1(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du// de na dga' bar byed/ rtse bar byed/ dga' 'gur spyod par byed do// de phyir lcin
435a2(mdo sde): ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/
435a3(mdo sde): mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ de las de dang rgyu 'thun par 'jig rten pa thams cad dga' zhing nor mang po dang ldan pa dang lho phyogs su gnod pa med par
435a4(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/ lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de// des
435a5(mdo sde): thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas sna tshogs shes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur
435a6(mdo sde): snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ 'di ltar sems can dang ldan par gyur cing / sems pas brlan pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang gis sems
435a7(mdo sde): can tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la bza' ba dang btung ba dang bca' ba dang / tshong ma sna tshogs dag byin na// de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten
435a8(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// las sna tshogs kyis bskyed pa/ bde ba sna tshogs la ni spyod/ g.yog dang mal stan sna tshogs kyi nang na ni 'gro/
435b1(mdo sde): bde bar gnas pa'i kun dga' ra ba dang 'gros sna tshogs ni byed/ tshal dang skyed mos tshal sna tshogs su ni 'gro// lha me'i tshogs cha byad sna tshogs pa ni phyi bzhan 'brang /
435b2(mdo sde): tshal dang nags dang / ri bo sna tshogs dang / chu bo dang pad ma'i tshal dang / ud pa la dang me tog dang / 'bras bu'i skyed mos tshal sna tshogs dag na ni gnas/ ba go
435b3(mdo sde): ba dang mal cha dang / skyed pa'i tshal sna tshogs na ni sbed / gzhi'i gtam brjod cing 'du 'dzi la dga' la/ shin tu chags pa'i sems sna tshogs kyis ni 'tshe// rtog pas
435b4(mdo sde): bskyed pa la ni dga' zhing / blo rnam par chags pa la rab tu myos pa yin te/ de ltar las sna tshogs byas nas/ rgyu sna tshogs byed pa de/ tshal sna tshogs rnams su
435b5(mdo sde): bde ba sna tshogs dag myong bar byed do// de nas dge slong de shin tu dga' nas/ 'di ltar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ ri mo mkhan gyi ri mo rnams// di na sna tshogs
435b6(mdo sde): dri ma yin/ gang zhig las kyi ri mo mkhan/ mthe ris su ni mang du dri// mtshon rtsis bris pa bris mi 'gyur// de ni bgrang bar grangs yod kyi// las kyis bris pa'i
435b7(mdo sde): grangs med de// de ni sems kyis 'dri bar byed// rtsig pa zhig na nges par yang // ri mo ma lus 'jig par 'gyur// las kyis bris pa lus zhig kyang // 'jig
435b8(mdo sde): pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar ri mo mkhan cig cig/ ri mo sna tshogs 'dri ba dag/ de bzhin sems ni cig pu yis// las rnams sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// ji ltar
436a1(mdo sde): mtshon rtsis gsal ba lngas// bris pa snang la stong par byed// de ltar dbang po lnga rnams kyis// las kyis 'khor ba 'khor bar 'dri// ri me mkhan
436a2(mdo sde): gyi mi dag ni// du ma dag tu snang 'gyur gyi// mi mo mkhan de sems phra bas// thams cad du ni mthong ngo // ri mo legs shing legs pa dag/ ji ltar rtsig ngos rnams la 'dri//
436a3(mdo sde): las rnams legs shing legs par dag/ de ltar sems la 'dri bar byed// ji ltar nyin dang mtshan rnams su// sems rgyun 'byung la sems gnas rgyur// de ltar nyin dang
436a4(mdo sde): mtshan rnams su// de bzhin las kyi rjes su 'jug/ ji ltar rlung dang dud pa rdul// gdung ba rnams kyis ri mo 'jog/ ji ltar dge dang mi dge ba// spangs na las kyi ri
436a5(mdo sde): mo 'jog/ de ltar dge slong des sems ri mo lta bu la rag las pa mngon par mthong nas/ las de nyid rnam par mthong bar 'khor ba las yid byung ngo // lha sna tshogs de
436a6(mdo sde): dag kyang ji srid du 'dod pa yid du 'ong ba'i las byas shing bsags pa/ bde 'gror nges par myong bar 'gyur ba de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du myong bar byed do//
436a7(mdo sde): de phyis lha'i 'jig rten de nas rang bzhin gyis dang 'jam pa/ drang ba g.yo med pa/ gzhan la gnod pa med pa gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze nyon mongs
436a8(mdo sde): mgon med pa rnams la nyin cig 'am/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ltar rim gas rgya cher rtag res 'khor byin na/ de lus dang bral nas
436b1(mdo sde): bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo // der skyes nas kyang mtho ris kyi bskyed mos tshal na bde bar gnas te/
436b2(mdo sde): gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bris la/ sgra mang po 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i tshal rnams kyi nang na/ lha me'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor cing / 'dod pa sdug pa yid
436b3(mdo sde): du 'ong ba'i yul la chags pa dag dga' mgur spyod par byed do// lha gzhon nu gzhan rab tu mang po rnams kyis mngon par mchod cing lha'i bdud rtsi skem mang pos myos/
436b4(mdo sde): me tog man da ra ba mang pos ni mgo brgyan/ pad+ma'i tshal gyi gsab gseb ni ni gnas/ gser dang bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang dngul gyi ri dgas la ni 'dzeg/ bung ba sgra skad snyan
436b5(mdo sde): pa 'byin pa'i pad+ma'i tshal rnams kyi nang na ni rnam par rgyu bar ni byed// lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyi ma 'bum se so 'gran pa lta bu'i me tog man da ra ba dang /
436b6(mdo sde): pad+ma'i tshal rnams kyi nang na gser gyi bya sgra 'byin pa thos na rnar snyan pa dang / rol mo yan lag lnga dang ldan pa/ thos na snyan cing bde ba rnams kyi nang na mngon par dga' bar
436b7(mdo sde): byed do// gser dang be dUr+ya'i rdo leb kyis gzhi legs par mnyam pa dang / mu tig gi bye mas bzhi mnyam pa'i 'tsho// lha'i chu yon tan lcug brgyad dang ldan pa rnams kyi
436b8(mdo sde): nang na dga' bar byed do// rang gis byas pa'i bsod nams kyi sprul pa'i lhun po dag la/ gser dang / bai durar+ya dang / dngul dang / shel gyi rnga yis mdzes par byas pa'i ri ban
437a1(mdo sde): #pa'i rtse mo dag la mngon par dga' bar byed de/ dga' ba dang skyid pa sna tshogs la gnas pa/ lha dang lha mos dkrigs pa'i nang na dgod cing rtse la g.yer ba/
437a2(mdo sde): lha dang lha me'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba de/ ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba/ rang gis byas shing bsags pa'i las de dag zad par ma gyur pa de srid du/ rang gis legs
437a3(mdo sde): par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar spyod par byed do// gang gi tshe zad par gyur pa dang / de phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar
437a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i las kyis/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ de las de dang rgyu 'thun par
437a5(mdo sde): rtag tu bde ba dang ldan zhing / ri 'bibs byed kyi sman ldong dag tu gnas pa dang / rgyal po'i yid ches par 'gyur bar mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par
437a6(mdo sde): smin pa shes pa de/ lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed do// des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/ lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi yul la 'dod pa
437a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba mthong // der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ sems dang ldan par 'gyur ba gang gis
437a8(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung / mi ldan yang rung / lta ba log par yang rung ba zhig nad kyis thebs pa la nad kyi rkyen dang sman dang / nad g.yog dag byin la de yang nad sas
437b1(mdo sde): par gyur na/ de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mthe ris kyi 'jig rten yul la dga' ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang 'jigs pa thams cad bral bar shes
437b2(mdo sde): pa de/ gzhan dag tu mchod cing / las 'phel ba/ las bde bar 'phel bar 'gyur te/ ji ltar mar me 'bar ba las 'od 'byung ba de ltar 'phel ba las bde ba 'phel bar
437b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de ltar lha rnams lha'i 'jig rten na las kyi 'bras bu de spyod pa rnam par smin pa shin tu nyams dga' ba dpe med pa/ thun mong ma yin pa dag 'byung ngo // legs
437b4(mdo sde): par byas pa'i las des der 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang /
437b5(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/ mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes la/ de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rtag tu zhes bya ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / nor dang ldan pa dang /
437b6(mdo sde): dpon sna byed pas 'tshe bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/ lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog
437b7(mdo sde): par byed do// des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas mtho bar gnas shes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo //
437b8(mdo sde): der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ legs par byas pa'i las mngon par shes pa/
438a1(mdo sde): sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems dang ldan pa gang gis/ sems can rnams kyi grang ba dang / tsha ba yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir/ bsod nams
438a2(mdo sde): kyi gnas mal byas na de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mthe ris kyi 'jig mtho bar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang reg pa la bde bar gnas pa de dbang
438a3(mdo sde): po lnga'i yul gyi bde ba rnam pa du ma rnam pa mang po myong bar 'gyur ro// lha'i ris de na tshal dang nye ba'i tshal dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ me tog man da ra ba la rtse ba dang / stug po sbyor gnas
438a4(mdo sde): dang / ngal so ba de dang / rtse dang / sgra 'byin ldan dang / sgyu ma kun dga' dang / 'jigs med de/ tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal de dag tu/ lha de lha memo'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis yongs su
438a5(mdo sde): bskor ba dang bcas pa dag dga' bar byed/ dgod par byed/ rtse bar byed/ sgeg par byed do// sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pas dga' bar byed cing / blo rad dgar gnas pa
438a6(mdo sde): bdag nyid chen po ci dgar sgrogs pa/ bde ba mchog dang ldan pa/ skyid par gnas pa rnams pad ma'i tshal nas pad+ma'i tshal du 'dong bar byed do// mtho ris dang 'thun par rin po che'i
438a7(mdo sde): snying po rab tu mang pos rnam par brgyan pa/ rtag tu bag tsha ba med par spyod pa rnams yul ma tho ba dang / gser gyi ri rab 'bar ba'i 'od rnams kyis gsal bar byas pa de dag la lus
438a8(mdo sde): nad med pa rnams yongs su rgyu bar byed cing / rtag tu bde bas myos par gnas pa/ legs par byas pa mang po 'dod par byas pa'i las kyis der skyes pa rnams dga' bar byed/
438b1(mdo sde): rtse bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// chu bo dang / 'bab chu dang / ldeng kas brgyan pa'i mthe ris kyi yul rnams na/ ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba'i las
438b2(mdo sde): de zad par ma gyur de srid du/ de na dga' bar byed do// de phyis lci'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las
438b3(mdo sde): kyis/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dad 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/ mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rgyal
438b4(mdo sde): po'i chos sems pa chen por 'gyur zhing 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo // dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa// // bam pa nyi shu brgyad pa/
438b5(mdo sde): de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/ lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas la rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtag na/
438b6(mdo sde): lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas rgun chad myos gnas shes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des
438b7(mdo sde): thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ legs par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' sprad pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur pa/ phan par 'dod pa dang 'jam pa'i snying
438b8(mdo sde): rje dang / rang bzhin gyis dang 'jam pa/ drang ba/ g.ye med pa/ gzhan la gnod pa med pa gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze nyin mongs mgon med pa rnams pa
439a1(mdo sde): nyin cig 'am/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ltar rim gyis rgya cher rtag res 'khor byin na/ de lus dang bral nas bde
439a2(mdo sde): 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo // der skyes nas kyang mthe ris kyi skyed mos tshal na bde bar gnas pa de/ gser gyi dril bu
439a3(mdo sde): g.yer ki'i dra ba bres pa/ sgra mang po 'byin pa dang / ldan pa'i tshal rnams kyi nang no/ lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / 'dod pa sdug pa yid du yong ba'i yul la chags
439a4(mdo sde): pa dag dga' mgur spyod par byed do// lha gzhon nu gzhan rab tu mang po rnams kyis mngon par mchod cing lci'i bdud rtsi skom pos ni myos/ me tog man da ra bi'i phreng bas ni mgo
439a5(mdo sde): brgyan pad ma'i tshal gyi gsapa gseb na ni gnas/ gser dang be dur+ya dang / shel dang dngul gyi ri dag la ni 'dzeg bung ba sgra skad snyan pa 'byin pa'i pad mi'i tshal rnam pAr
439a6(mdo sde): rtsub ni byed/ bla ma'i tshogs kyis sangs sa ban cing gis 'dams sen 'thun pa gakhri'i ma theg sa da dar ba dang / ba pal sa rnams kyi nang dag par klu sgra 'byi rnamams
439a7(mdo sde): thos na rnar snyan pa dang / rol mo yan lag lnga dang ldan pa/ thos na snyan cing bde ba rnams kyi nang na mngon par dga' bar byed do// gser dang bai dUr+ya'i rdo leb kyi sa gzhi legs
439a8(mdo sde): par mnyam pa dang / mu tig gi bye mas bzhi mnyam pa'i mtsho/ lha'i chu yon tan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa rnams kyi nang na dga' bar byed do// rang gis byas pa'i bsod nams
439b1(mdo sde): kyis sprul pa'i lhun po dag la/ gser dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dngul dang / shel gyi rdo yis mdzes par byas pa'i ri bzang po'i rtse mo dag mngon par dga' bar byed de dga' ba
439b2(mdo sde): dang skyid pa sna tshogs la gnas pa/ lha dang lha mos dkrigs pa'i nang na dgod cing rtse la g.yer ba// lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba de/ ji srid du 'dod pa
439b3(mdo sde): sdug pa yid du 'ong ba/ rang gis byas shing bsags pa'i lnga de dag zad par gyur pa de srid du/ rang gis legs par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar spyod par byed do//
439b4(mdo sde): gang gi tshe zad par gyur pa dang / de phyis lha'i ris de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi
439b5(mdo sde): dwags dang / dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/ mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ de las de dang rgyu 'thun par rtag tu bde ba dang ldan zhing / ra 'bibs byed kyi
439b6(mdo sde): sman ldong dag tu gnas pa dang / rgyal po'i yid ches par 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa de/ lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams
439b7(mdo sde): kyi gnas la rnam par rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/ lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas yul la 'dod pa zhes bya ba mthong ngo // der sems can
439b8(mdo sde): dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ sems dang ldan par gyur pa gang gis tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung / mi
440a1(mdo sde): ldan yang rung / lta ba log kyang rung / ma log kyang rung ba zhig nad kyis thebs pa la/ nad rkyen dang / sman dang / nad g.yog dag byin la/ de yang nad
440a2(mdo sde): sos par gyur na/ de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten yul la dga' ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang 'jigs pa thams cad
440a3(mdo sde): dang bral bar shes pa de gzhan dag tu mchod cing / las 'phel ba/ las bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur te/ ji ltar mar me 'bar ba las 'od 'byung ba de ltar las 'phel ba las
440a4(mdo sde): bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de ltar lha rnams lha'i 'jig rten na las kyi 'bras bu de la spyod pa rnam par smin pa shin tu nyams dga' ba/ dpe med pa/ thun mong ma yin pa dag
440a5(mdo sde): 'byung ngo // legs par byas pa'i las des der skyes pa de/ bai dUr+ya dang / nor bu dang / dngul gyi lhun po gsal ba'i rtse mo mthon po rnams na/ shin tu bde bar gnas pa'i kun
440a6(mdo sde): dga' ra ba dag yod de// skyed mos tshal dang / stegs du mas brgyan pa'i sa dag la gnas shing tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ 'od sna tshogs kyis yun
440a7(mdo sde): ring du nyams dga' bar byed pa rnams kyi nang na/ lha mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/ de dag gis rtsed mor byed pa na/ de ltar dbang po lnga dang / blo yul la chags pa
440a8(mdo sde): de ci dga' 'gur bde ba la gnas te/ ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur de srid du/ lha yul lha'i gnas de na 'dod pa
440b1(mdo sde): thams cad la blo rnam par chags pa de dga' bar byed/ gnas par byed/ dga' mgur spad par byed de/ de zad nas de nas yang las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin/ sems
440b2(mdo sde): can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ de las de dang rgyu mthun pa'i byad gzugs
440b3(mdo sde): bzang po dang ldan zhing / gar yang 'jigs pa med pa dang / nor bzang po dang ldan pa dang / rgyal po'i 'khor gyis mchod pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / yul bzang por skyes te/
440b4(mdo sde): dus kyang chos bzang po la dga' ba'i dus su skye bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa des/ lha rtag tu myos gnas la rtog
440b5(mdo sde): par byed de/ des thos pa las byang ba'i shes pas/ rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas/ chu bsil gnas shes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // der sems can dag
440b6(mdo sde): las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ snying rje can sems pas yongs su bsgoms pa'i snying dang ldan pa gang gis sems can
440b7(mdo sde): gzhan mchis pa'i dus kyi tshe/ skom gyis gdungs pa skom pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir 'am/ gshin rje'i mi'i 'jigs pa bstan nas 'khrugs par gyur pa la/ bu ram chu 'am/
440b8(mdo sde): chu grang mo blud na/ de legs par byas pa'i las kyis mthu des gang gi tshe 'chi bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ lha rtag tu myos gnas rnams kyi gnas chu bsil bar gnas shes bya ba lha
441a1(mdo sde): de dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang / ngachu bsil ba'i tshogs 'bab nu dang / chu bo phun sum tshogs pa'i sa phyogs dag na/ de dag dga'
441a2(mdo sde): bar byed do// de'i lha'i btung ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ mthong na myos pa skyed pa dang / dris myos pa skyed pa dang / reg pas myos pa skyed pa dang /
441a3(mdo sde): sgra thos na myos pa skyed par byed pa/ myos pa'i skyon dang bral zhing snying dga' bar byed pa yin no// yon tan lnga dang ldan pa'i btung ba dag kyang 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ btung ba de
441a4(mdo sde): dag 'thungs na/ lha rnams lha'i stobs bcu 'gyur du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar nam mkha' la 'gro ba nyams par yang mi 'gyur zhing / ltung bar yang mi 'gyur la/
441a5(mdo sde): de bzhin du sa la yang 'bying ba mi 'gyur ro// de'i brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa yang med la/ ca tse dang gzhi'i sgra la mngon par dga' zhing / yid shin tu dga' ba te/
441a6(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ba brgya 'gyur du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i rna ba yang mnyan par bya ba la thogs pa med de/ shin tu bde ba yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba/ mtho ris dang
441a7(mdo sde): mthun par gnas pa/ yul gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba dag myong ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa'i tshal 'di lta bu dag kyang yod de/ 'di lta ste/
441a8(mdo sde): tshal g.yer byed dang / tshal kun dga' dang / tshal dga' bder gnas dang / tshal yid tshim dang / chal rlung bde dang / tshal sgra lnga 'dzin dang / tshal 'dab sgra rol mo
441b1(mdo sde): dang / tshal yid mthun dang / chol bde bar gnas pa de rnams kyi nang na mngon par dga' bar byed do// mig gis kyang gzugs 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba dag mthong ngo //
441b2(mdo sde): rna bas kyang sgra snyan par rnar 'thad pa yid du 'ong ba dag thos so// snas kyang dri zhim pa/ gsung che ba yid du 'ongs pa dag sdom mo// de ltar lces kyang ro zhim pa/ bro cheb
441b3(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba dag myong ste/ de ltar rnam pa de lta bus yid tshim par byas pa'i snying dang dbang po lnga yul la chags pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba de dag myong bar byed do//
441b4(mdo sde): de ltar de srid pa'i tshogs drug gi mes nyin cig bzhin sreg par byed la/ 'dod chags mes kyang nyin cig bzhin yongs su sreg ste/ 'dod chags kyi me dang / bag med pa'i
441b5(mdo sde): me lce drag shin tu stobs che bar gyur kyang / de dag des mi rig go/ bag med pa des yid phrogs shing / bag med pa'i gnas su skyes pa/ bag med pa des nyams pa/
441b6(mdo sde): legs par byas pa'i las des yul gyi bde ba la lhag par dga' ba zag pa med pa de ni/ ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba byas shing bsags pa'i las de zad par ma gyur
441b7(mdo sde): pa de srid du/ de na bde ba myong bar byed do// gang gi tshe zad par ma gyur pa dang / de phyis lci'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong
441b8(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gre'i nang du ma skyes la/ mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ de las de dang
442a1(mdo sde): rgyu mthun par bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / ngal ba dang / le nyes byung ba'i 'jigs pa yod mi 'byung la/ rtag par shin tu bde bar gnas pa dang /
442a2(mdo sde): yul mthong ba rnams su 'ongs na yang dga' ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur ba dang de la bya ba med bzhin du yang mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad mang po dang sbyin par
442a3(mdo sde): byed pa mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par shes pa de lha rtag tu myos gnas la rtog par byed de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/ lha rtag
442a4(mdo sde): tu myos gnas brtan dga' zhes bya ba ji ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo // der sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/
442a5(mdo sde): gang gis spong ba'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong yid skyo bar bya ba'i phyir/ mi ro 'am mi lta bur bris pa cig bzhag na/ de bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten rtag dga'i
442a6(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang rtag tu rtag dga' de/ bai dUr+ya dang / gser dang / byi ru dang / an da rnyil dang / ma rgad lta bu'i mtho yang dang yang du
442a7(mdo sde): dga' bar byed cing nyin cig bzhin du bde ba bar chad med pa 'bum rnyed dag myong bar byed do// rol mo mang po du ma 'bum rnyed dag mang du thos na/ bar chad med par dga' ba la
442a8(mdo sde): lhag par chags te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni dpe byar yang med la// mtho ris su zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / me tog dang dris myos shing dga'
442b1(mdo sde): ba mang po du ma 'byung ngo // der dga' ba 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste// 'di lta ste/ tshal mthong na dga' ba dang / bya sna tshogs sgra 'byin na dga' ba dang / rol mos dga' ba dang /
442b2(mdo sde): lha mo mthong na dga' ba dang / rgyags par gnas na dga' ba dang / dri zhim pos dga' ba dang / thags su ma thags pa'i gos gyon na dga' ba dang / sdes sna tshogs kyis pheg na
442b3(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba sna tshogs na dga' ba dang / rtsen pas dga' ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro bas dga' ba dang / snying du sdug pa'i lha mthong na dga' ba
442b4(mdo sde): dang / rin po che'i rtse mo nas ri'i rtse mo ldan/ dga' ba ste/ de dag la sogs pas mngon par dga' la/ dga' ba du ma gzhan rnams la yang shin tu chags te/ bde ba shin
442b5(mdo sde): tu yid du 'ong ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i glu dbyangs len pa dang / rang gis byas pa'i bde ba la gnas pa'i lha'i bde ba rnam pa du ma de
442b6(mdo sde): dag ji srid du 'dod pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba legs par byas pa'i las de zad par ma gyur pa de srid du myong bar byed de// de zad nas de nas yang lha'i 'jig rten de nas
442b7(mdo sde): yang / lci'i 'jig rten de nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ shi nas kyang gal te lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyis/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang /
442b8(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i nang du ma skyes la/ mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par mi'i nang du skyes na/ de las de dang rgyu 'thun par/ bskyed mos tshal sna tshogs kyi nang du gnas shing /
443a1(mdo sde): shin tu bde ba dang ldan pa dang // bag pa'i gos sna tshogs dang / dga' gtam sna tshogs dang / spyod pa sna tshogs dang / blta bar bya ba sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur
443a2(mdo sde): ba mthong ngo // de nas yang dge slong des rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi gnas gsum dang / las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa/ rnam par phye nas/ gnas bzhi pa la rtog par byed
443a3(mdo sde): de/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas/ pi bang can gsum pa zhes bya ba'i lha rnams mthong ngo // de rnams kyi rna yang 'di lta ste/ dri dga' dang / sgra snyan dang / de la chags dang /
443a4(mdo sde): skyor chu skyes dang / lus dkar dang / phan tshun dga' dang / yang dag chags spyod dang / 'khor dang rnam spyod dang / dkyil mo krud kyi steng du skye ba dang / ldan par gnas pa
443a5(mdo sde): dag ste/ lha pi bang can gsum pa rnams kyi gnas ni bcu po de dag yin no// dge slong de rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par 'byed par byed de/ gnas de rnams lha dag las
443a6(mdo sde): gang gis skye bar 'gyur ji gu snyam nas/ des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pas brtags na/ 'di ltar las de dag byed na/ de ltar de dang mthun par skye bar 'gyur la/ las
443a7(mdo sde): dang mthun par rnam par smin pa 'byung ngo // de la rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas dang po dri dga' zhes bya ba der/ sems can dag las gang gis skye bar 'gyur snyam nas/ des thos pa
443a8(mdo sde): las byung ba'i shes pas brtags ni/ sems pa dang ldan par gyur cing / des sems bsgoms pa/ de lus bsgoms pa gang gis bsod nams bsags par bya ba'i phyir/
443b1(mdo sde): dge 'dun dag la kun dga'i ra ba'i sam/ bu ram shing gi ra ba 'am/ 'bre go'i ra ba 'am/ shing a mri'i ra ba phul la/ de yang yongs su spyod par byed na/ de lus dang
443b2(mdo sde): bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dri dga'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang / bde ba du ma thob cing spyod pa de/ lci'i tsan dan dang / can dan
443b3(mdo sde): sa mchog gi byeg pas lus byugs pa/ lha mo'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor ba/ gzugs dang cha byad sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ dgod pa dang / rtse ba dang / skyeg
443b4(mdo sde): chos la mkhas pa rnams dang lhan cig pa da mi'i tshal dang / lteng ka dang / nags tshal gyi bar dag na/ me tog gi phreng ba dang / gos gyon pa/ yid rab tu dga' bar byed/
443b5(mdo sde): dga' 'gur spod par byed do// de'i lha'i dri rnam pa du ma dag pad ma'i tshal de dang / lha'i me tog de dag brtol nas/ dpag tshad brgyar gsung stobs cher 'byung ngo // dri bsnam
443b6(mdo sde): pi'i lha ma gang yin pa de dag thams cad dri shin tu nyams dga' zhing / mchog tu yid du 'ong ba rnam pa du mas myos pa rnams/ yang lha'i dri des brgya 'gyur du myos par 'gyur
443b7(mdo sde): ro// shin tu myos pa'i lha'i ris de dag nyid la sems chags pa rnams lnga de dag nyid dang / rnam pa du ma brgyar 'gyur du dga' mgur spyod par byed la/ de rnams dang
443b8(mdo sde): lhan cig chu bo'i drung du 'gro bar byed do// chu bo de dag gi ming ni 'di lta ste/ rin chen 'brab ces bya ba dang / rin po che'i dum bu 'bab pa dang / gser 'bab dang /
444a1(mdo sde): chang 'bab chu bo dang / sbrang rtsi 'bab pa'i chu dong dang / dbu ba rog rog 'bab pa dag ste/ chu bo de dag thams cad kyi 'gram na/ bya dang ga
444a2(mdo sde): dang / ka ra na da ba dang / dur pa'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ bya sgra 'byin pa rnams dang / shing ljon pas mtha' khebs pa yin la/ shing de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun
444a3(mdo sde): gyi bya rnams kyis/ kun nas dkrigs shing sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa dag yin te/ lha me'i tshogs glu snyan pa len pa la mkhas pa gang yin pa de dag kyang / bya sgra dbyas
444a4(mdo sde): 'byin pa thos nas/ tshal gyi nang na rgyu ba'i bya gzhan sgra 'byin pa lha'i ltar snyan pa de dag las shin tu nyan par byed do// yul gyi 'dod pa la sems rnam par chags shing /
444a5(mdo sde): bya'i sgra 'byin pa de la/ snying shin tu chags pa de dag gis bde ba de thams cad bor nas/ byi'i sgra de la nyan par byed de/ bya'i sgra yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs dang / thos na
444a6(mdo sde): bde ba rnam pa du ma sna tshogs dang / sgra dbyangs bdun dang / ldan zhing rgyun mi drag par 'byin pa la nyan par byed do// chu bo gzhan dag tu sgra 'byin par lha mo rnams
